body_html:
Read your post carefully, you indeed mentioned that on machines that do not support AVX512, things seemed to work.
I think there is a known issue for Eigen AVX512 and we/Intel are working with Eigen community to fix that. https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/361/fix-for-avx512/diff
So the workaround is please for now build with "-march=broadwell" before Eigen AVX512 issue is fully fixed.

So the workaround is please for now build with "-march=broadwell" before Eigen AVX512 issue is fully fixed.
body:
Read your post carefully, you indeed mentioned that on machines that do not support AVX512, things seemed to work. 
I think there is a known issue for Eigen AVX512 and we/Intel are working with Eigen community to fix that. https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/361/fix-for-avx512/diff 
So the workaround is please for now build with "-march=broadwell" before Eigen AVX512 issue is fully fixed.
